name: Skyhawk Aviation
about: Skyhawk Aviation, based at Lanseria International Airport in South Africa, is a comprehensive flight training operation renowned for its high-quality approach and emphasis on interaction with experienced instructors. Founded by Mike Gough, the school aims to avoid the "sausage machine" syndrome, integrating safety principles of airline flying into its training programs. With CAA Approval 0339, Skyhawk offers a range of courses including Private Pilot License, Night Rating, Commercial Pilot License, ATPL Preparation, Instrument Rating, and Instructors Rating. The school is equipped with modern aircraft and provides hire and fly options, as well as structured hour-building packages. Known for its professional and friendly environment, Skyhawk Aviation is committed to transforming aspiring aviators into skilled professionals, ensuring a safe and successful aviation career.
